enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve validating and converting characters within a string, which can be useful for setting up test cases.
The weightedValue method calculates values based on character positions, similar to how isValid processes the code string, making it useful for setting up test cases.
The toString method provides a string representation of the object's state, which can be used to verify the internal state after calling isValid.
Both methods involve potential exception handling, particularly related to invalid characters or positions, which can inform the construction of assertions for error scenarios.
